name: Under Pressure (itch) (Teanan, Salier, Evanaellio)
description:
You’ve been assigned the respectuous job of… maintaining a boiler. Keep the boiler warm by giving it coal, fixing problems as they go and don’t forget about answering the phone! How to play
  1. Give coal to the boiler to start;
  2. Maintain the temperature and pressure at acceptable levels;
  3. Fix the occasionnal inconvenience that can happen;
  4. Respond to the phone to keep contact of the demand;
  5. Follow all those points to not get fired and keep your job!
Controls
  • Left click : To select a tool, take some coal or fix a disturbance while having the right tool in hand.
  • Right click : To let go of a tool or hang up the phone.
